EmailTemplate.subject: [Reminder]: Welcome to Zeitgold
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{{Recipient.FirstName}}},
Once again, a warm welcome to Zeitgold! I am {{{Sender.FirstName}}} and will accompany you in your Onboarding process at Zeitgold. To guarantee a smooth start, I would like to remind you of the following things:
1. Your First In-App Tasks To make sure you are all ready for your start, please log into your Zeitgold App and complete your first app tasks.
2. Send us a recent Z-Report and BWA Furthermore, please send me the following important items via E-Mail to ensure any technical adjustments can be made:
A picture of a Z-Report from your cash register system (including the various available revenue types) A recent business assessment (BWA) from your current financial tax advisor
Please complete these tasks as soon as possible, so that nothing stands in the way of our start. If you have any further questions, feel free to contact us at service@zeitgold.com or by telephone at 030/30808111.
I am looking forward getting to know you!
Best Wishes,
{{{Sender.FirstName}}} at Zeitgold
